greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Binary expansions of A122245 (A122246) concatenated together to a single binary sequence, so that from each term of A122245, the most significant bits come before the least significant bits.
comment: When viewed as a table, the first row contains six terms, the second eight, the third ten, and so on, i.e. row n contains 2(n+2) terms.
link: A. Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..593664 (containing 768 first rows)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 03 2010
